item.title: About Me
item.description:
Karan Dhillon

Software Engineer | Performance & Reliability Specialist

I am a software engineer with over 7 years of Android development experience, specializing in performance engineering, system health, and large-scale debugging for high-traffic apps. Currently, I am at Instagram (Meta), focusing on optimizing experiences for over 1 billion daily active users.

Professional Experience

Instagram, Meta | Software Engineer (Mar 2022 – Current)

  • App Start Optimization: Designed and deployed an ML model to predict app-start types, contributing to a 20% increase in lukewarm starts.
  • Navigation Latency: Improved navigation latency on Feed by 15%, Reels by 12%, and Stories by 8% using network streaming and layout pre-inflation.
  • System Health: Reduced main-thread red events (busy for 1000ms) by 5% and yellow events by 15%, directly improving scroll performance and reducing jank.
  • Incident Management: Investigated top-line metric regressions and led multiple SEV1/SEV2 investigations across global outages.

Hootsuite | Software Engineer (Mar 2021 – Mar 2022)

  • Reliability: Maintained Android applications serving over 500,000 monthly active users (MAU).
  • Modernization: Led critical modernization efforts, including the migration from Dagger to Hilt and CI pipeline updates.
  • Accessibility: Implemented TalkBack and Screen Reader support to ensure compliance and enhance usability.

HomeStars | Mobile Engineer (Dec 2019 – Mar 2021)

  • Feature Delivery: Delivered core Android features in Kotlin and Java for a user base of 50,000+ MAU.
  • Stability: Significantly improved app stability by implementing Jetpack components, Room database, and monitoring via Crashlytics and Datadog.

Technical Skills

  • Languages: Kotlin, Java, C++, C, SQL.
  • Android: Jetpack (Lifecycle, Room, Navigation), Compose, Coroutines, Flows, and WorkManager.
  • Performance Tooling: Perfetto, Systrace, and Android Studio Profiler.
  • Expertise: ML-Driven Optimization, System Health, SEV Leadership, and Large-Scale Debugging.

Education

  • Postgraduate Certificate, Enterprise Software Development | Humber College, Toronto.
  • Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science | Punjab Technical University, India.
